translation.xho: ISwitzerland ngoLwesihlanu ibeke isidingo sokuba umntu avalelwe yedwa iintsuku ezili-10 kunye novavanyo oluthi akunaso esisifo kubahambi abavela eBelgium, eIsrael kunye naseHong Kong, ukongeza kwizithintelo zabahambi abasuka kumazwe aseMazantsi e-Afrika.

translation.en: Italy Imposes Entry Ban on Eight Southern African States
translation.xho: I-Italy ibeka umthetho wokuvalwa kwayo kubantu abasuka kwamazwe asibhozo akuMazantsi e-Afrika

translation.en: Italy imposed an entry ban Friday on people who have visited any one of eight southern African states in the last 14 days, because of the spread of a new COVID-19 variant there.
translation.xho: I-Italy ibeke uthetho wokuvalwa kwayo ngolwesiHlanu kubantu abakhe bandwendwela naliphi na ilizwe kumazwe asibhozo aseMazantsi e-Afrika kwezi ntsuku zili-14 zidlulileyo, ngenxa yokusasazeka kodidi olutsha lwe-COVID-19 khona.

translation.en: Italian Health Minister Roberto Speranza signed an executive order banning entry of travelers from South Africa, Lesotho, Botswana, Malawi, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Namibia and Eswatini.
translation.xho: Umphathiswa wezempilo e-Italy uRoberto Speranza utyikitye umyalelo olawulayo wokuvalelwa kwabahambi abavela eMzantsi Afrika, eLesotho, eBotswana, eMalawi, eZimbabwe, eMozambique, eNamibia nase-Eswatini.

translation.en: Our scientists are studying the new B.1.1.529 variant.
translation.xho: “Iinzululwazi zethu zifunda uhlobo olutsha lwe-B.1.1.529.

translation.en: In the meantime, we will adopt the greatest possible caution," Speranza said.
translation.xho: Okwangalomzuzu, siza kuthatha esona silumkiso sibalaseleyo,”utshilo uSperanza.

translation.en: Zimbabwe Environmentalists Demand More Than Rhetoric on Climate Change
translation.xho: Iingcali zokusingqongileyo zaseZimbabwe zifuna ngaphezulu malunga nentetho ngoTshintsho lweMozulu

translation.en: Environmentalists in Zimbabwe are reacting angrily to President Emmerson Mnangagwa's address at the COP26 conference, where he pledged his government's fight against deforestation and climate change.
translation.xho: Iingcali zokusingqungileyo eZimbabwe ziphendule ngomsindo kwintetho kaMongameli uEmmerson Mnangagwa kwinkomfa ye-COP26, apho athembise ngokulwa kukarhulumente wakhe esilwela ngokuchaseneyo nokugawulwa kwamahlathi kunye nokutshintsha kwemozulu.

translation.en: Environmentalists say the government is busy dishing out land to companies, mainly Chinese, to mine coal for energy use, which COP26 wants phased out.
translation.xho: Iingcali zokusingqungileyo zithi urhulumente uxakekile enikezela ngomhlaba kwiinkampani, ingakumbi ezamaTshayina, ukuba zembe amalahle ukuze zisebenzise amandla, nto leyo i-COP26 ifuna apheliswe.

translation.en: Tuesday in Scotland, President Emmerson Mnangagwa addressed the 2021 United Nations Climate Change Conference, known as COP26, where he urged developed countries to pay for causing global warming by emitting gases into the atmosphere.
translation.xho: NgoLwesibini eSkotlani, uMongameli uEmmerson Mnangagwa uthethe kwiNkomfa yeZizwe eziManyeneyo yoTshintsho lweMozulu ka-2021, eyaziwa ngokuba yiCOP26, apho ebongoze amazwe aphuhlileyo ukuba ahlawule ngokubangela ukufudumala kwehlabathi ngokukhupha iigesi emoyeni.

translation.en: He said developing nations like Zimbabwe were paying for the consequences of those emissions.
translation.xho: Uthe amazwe asaphuhlayo afana neZimbabwe ahlawula iziphumo zoko kukhutshwa komoya ongcolileyo.

translation.en: He also pledged his countrys cooperation in the fight against climate change.
translation.xho: Ukwathembise ngentsebenziswano lelizwe lakhe kumlo ochasene nokutshintsha kwemozulu.

translation.en: Zimbabwe has revised its nationally determined contributions, a committed conditional 40% per capita greenhouse gas emissions reduction target by 2030.
translation.xho: “IZimbabwe iye yalihlaziya igalelo layo elimiselwe kuzwelonke, ukuzimisela okunemiqathango engama-40% ngomntu ngamnye ekujoliswe ekunciphiseni kokukhutshwa kwegesi engcolisayo ngo-2030.

translation.en: Comprehensive strategies are being implemented towards mainstreaming climate change adaptation and resilience across all sectors of our economy," Mnangagwa said.
translation.xho: Amaqhinga abanzi ayaphunyezwa ekumiseleni uhlengahlengiso lokutshintsha kwemozulu kunye nokomelela kuwo onke amacandelo oqoqosho lwethu, utshilo uMnangagwa.

translation.en: This comes at a time when environmentalists in Zimbabwe are asking the government to revoke an exploration license recently awarded to a Chinese company to mine coal for energy use.
translation.xho: Oku kuvele kanye xa iingcaki zokusingqungileyo eZimbabwe zicela urhulumente ukuba arhoxise iphepha-mvume lokuhlola elinikwe inkampani yase China ukuba imbe amalahle ukuze isebenzise amandla awo.

translation.en: The Center for Natural Resource Governance is one of the organizations opposing the license.
translation.xho: Iziko loLawulo lweMithombo yeNdalo ngomnye wemibutho ephikisana nokunikezelwa kweli phepha-mvume.

translation.en: The group promotes green energy, and fears that exploration for coal will cause greater deforestation.
translation.xho: Eli qela likhuthaza amandla ohlaza, kwaye liloyiko lokuba ukusetyenziswa  kwamalahle kubangela ukutshatyalaliswa kwamahlathi okugqithisileyo.

translation.en: Henry Nyapokoto, the program manager for the group, said Mnangagwas comments run contrary to what he sees going on.
translation.xho: UHenry Nyapokoto, umphathi wenkqubo yeli qela, uthe izimvo zikaMnangagwa zihamba ngokuchasene noko akubona kusenzeka.

translation.en: But the government has been in overdrive mode to promote mining everywhere in order to reach the $12 billion mining economy.
translation.xho: “Kodwa urhulumente ebekwimo esebenza ngokugqithisileyo ukukhuthaza imigodi kuyo yonke indawo ukuze kufikelelwe kuqoqosho lwemigodi yeebhiliyoni eziyi-12 zeedola.

translation.en: In fact, it wont (make) ecological sense for Zimbabwe to attain a $12 billion economy based on bad models of production, bad consumption, that leaves a huge ecological footprint or a legacy of an ecological disaster.
translation.xho: Kunjalo nje, ayenzi ngqiqo yendalo ukuba iZimbabwe ifumane uqoqosho lweedola ezili-12 leebhiliyoni ezisekelwe kwiindlela ezimbi zemveliso, ukusetyenziswa okungalunganga, okushiya kusetyesiswe indawo enkulu yendalo okanye ilifa lentlekele yendalo.

translation.en: We all understand that mining comes with destruction of forests that serves as carbon sinks and habitat for wildlife," Nyapokoto said.
translation.xho: Sonke siyaqonda ukuba imigodi iza nokutshatyalaliswa kwamahlathi asebenza njengendawo yokucoca umoya nendawo apho izilwanyana zasendle zihlala khona,” utshilo uNyapokoto.

translation.en: Nyapokoto added that Zimbabwe was exploring oil and gas on its northeast border with Zambia, another project that could lead to deforestation.
translation.xho: UNyapokoto wongeze wathi iZimbabwe ihlola ioyile negesi kumda wayo osemntla-mpuma neZambia, enye yezinto enokukhokelela ekutshatyalalisweni kwamahlathi.

translation.en: Despite the impact of oil and gas on global warming, there will be (a) visible, immediate direct effect of this oil and gas mining on local communities or ecosystems.
translation.xho: Ngaphandle kwempembelelo yeoyile kunye negesi kukufudumala kwehlabathi, kuza kubakho (a) isiphumo esicacileyo, esithe ngqo sale migodi yeoli kunye negesi kuluntu okanye kwinqkubo yendalo.

translation.en: Land will be cleared for mining and other infrastructure that is going to support that mining.
translation.xho: Umhlaba uya kucocwa ukwenzela imigodi nezinye iziseko zophuhliso eziza kuxhasa loo migodi.

translation.en: That is contrary to the greening of the economy that they are talking about in Glasgow," Nyapokoto said.
translation.xho: Oku kuchasene nokwenza luhlaza uqoqosho abathetha ngalo eGlasgow,” utshilo uNyapokoto.

translation.en: He said Zimbabwe was in the top 10 of countries of deforestation, with about 300,000 hectares of forests destroyed annually.
translation.xho: Uthe iZimbabwe ikwishumi lamazwe aphambili ekutshatyalalwisweni kwamahlathi, malunga neehektare ezingama-300,000 zamahlathi ezithi zigawulwe ngonyaka.

translation.en: But Byron Zamasiya of the Zimbabwe Environmental Law Association says Mnangagwa was genuine in his COP26 address about fighting deforestation caused by need for energy.
translation.xho: Kodwa uByron Zamasiya weZimbabwe Environmental Law Association uthi uMnangagwa wayenyanisekile kwintetho yakhe yeCOP26 malunga nokulwa ukugawulwa kwamahlathi okubangelwa sisidingo sokusebenzisa amandla ombane.

translation.en: So, the issue of fighting deforestation is a key ingredient for addressing greenhouse gas emissions for Zimbabwe.
translation.xho: “Kungoko ke, umba wokulwa ukutshatyalaliswa kwamahlathi yeyona nto iphambili ekufuneka inikwe iingqwalasela malunga nokukhutshwa kwegreenhouse gas eZimbabwe.

translation.en: The trees act as a carbon sink since they absorb carbon dioxide, which is a major cause of global warming.
translation.xho: Imithi isebenza njengendawo yokucoca umoya njengoko ifunxa icarbon dioxide, eyona nto ingunobangela wokufudumala kwehlabathi.

translation.en: What we may want as a country is to make available alternative sources of energy, especially for the rural communities who rely on wood fuel and account for the major part of deforestation.
translation.xho: Into esinokuyifuna njengelizwe kukufumana eminye imithombo yamandla ombane ekhoyo, ingakumbi kuluntu lwasemaphandleni oluthembele kumafutha eenkuni kwaye olunenxalenye enkulu ekugawuleni imithi.

translation.en: We may also need to promote intensive farming methods as opposed to extensive farming methods that require bigger fields and the clearing of new forests for fields," Zamasiya said.
translation.xho: Kuunganyanzeleka ukuba sikhuthaze iindlela zokulima ngokunzulu ngokuchasene neendlela ezibanzi zokulima ezifuna amasimi amakhulu kunye nokutshatyalaliswa kwamahlathi amatsha ukwenzela amasimi,” utshilo uZamasiya.

translation.en: The Environmental Management Agency in Zimbabwe has been fining people caught cutting or burning forests. But so far, that hasnt stopped the trees from coming down.
translation.xho: IArhente yoLawulo lokusiNgqongileyo eZimbabwe ihlawulise abantu ababanjwe begawula okanye betshisa imithi. Kodwa ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, oko akukunciphisanga ukutshatyalaliswa kweimithi.

translation.en: Young Africans Struggle With Jobs, Education Amid Pandemic
translation.xho: Abantu abatsha base-Afrika basokola ukufumana imisebenzi, imfundo phakathi kwesifo selizwe lonke.

translation.en: The future looked promising for Tinashe Mapuranga, an intern at a leading bank in Zimbabwe who appeared set to get a staff position as soon as he completed his college degree.
translation.xho: Ikamva belikade libonakala lithembisa kuTinashe Mapuranga, umfundi oqeqeshelwa umsebenzi kwibhanki enqenqeza phambili eZimbabwe nothe wabonakala engathi angafumana isikhundla somsebenzi akugqiba izifundo zakhe sasekholeji.

translation.en: Then the COVID-19 pandemic hit.
translation.xho: Emva koko isifo esichaphazela izwelonke i-COVID-19 safika.

translation.en: Amid the lockdowns, the 24-year-old was one of the first to be laid off and has no idea when he'll be able to get his degree because of frequent school closures.
translation.xho: Ngelixa kuvaliwe, lo mfo uneminyaka engama-24 waba ngomnye wabokuqala ukugxothwa kwaye akanalo nofifi lokuba uya kukwazi nini ukufumana isidanga sakhe ngenxa yusoloqo kuvalwa izikolo.

translation.en: It has really affected me a lot in my studies.
translation.xho: Indichaphazele kakhulu ezifundweni zam.

translation.en: I have no money to buy data and I don't have a personal laptop to study online and keep up like what others are doing," said Mapuranga, who lives with his mother in Chitungwiza, a sprawling working-class area southeast of Harare, the capital.
translation.xho: Andinayo imali yokuthenga idatha kwaye andinayo ilaptop yokufunda kwi-Intanethi ukuze ndiqhubeke njengoko abanye beqhuba, utshilo uMapuranga, ohlala nomama wakhe eChitungwiza, indawo ethe tyaba yabasebenzi kumazantsi mpuma eHarare. ikomkhulu.

translation.en: I was supposed to finish in November or December 2021, but as of now, we haven't completed much of the work," he said.
translation.xho: “Bekufanele ukuba ndiyagqiba ngoNovemba okanye ngoDisemba ka-2021, kodwa okwangoku, asikabiphi nomsebenzi omninzi,” utshilo.

translation.en: Truly speaking, I am not sure when I will finish the degree. I can't wait to graduate and find a job and do something tangible in life."
translation.xho: Xa ndithetha inyani, andiqinisekanga ukuba ndizakuzigqiba nini izifundo. ingathi andide digqibe ndifumane umsebenzi ndenze into ebonakalayo ebomini.

translation.en: Mapuranga spends most of his time at home, tending a tiny vegetable garden that is the family's main source of food.
translation.xho: UMapuranga ixesha elininzi ulichitha esekhaya, ehoyene negadi encinci yemifuno  engumthombo wokutya kolu sapho.

translation.en: His mother ekes out a living traveling to South Africa to sell things like stone carvings and brooms on the streets, a trade also badly hit by the pandemic.
translation.xho: Umama wakhe uzama ukuphila ngokuthi ahambela eMzantsi Afrika ayokuthengisa ezitalatweni izinto ezifana nemizobo yamatye kunye nemitshayelo, imveliso achaphazeleke kakubi sisifo esihlasela uzwelonke.

translation.en: We've been trying to hustle to get some money," he said.
translation.xho: “Besizama ukusebenza ukuze sifumane imali,"utshilo.

translation.en: I tried to do a small business selling cooking gas but the authorities chased us away from the streets.
translation.xho: “Ndizamile ukwenza ishishini elincinci lokuthengisa igesi yokupheka kodwa abasemagunyeni basigxotha ezitalatweni.

translation.en: My father passed away.
translation.xho: Utata wasweleka.

translation.en: My mother is into informal business, but it's also down with these lockdowns.
translation.xho: Umama ukwishishini elingekho sikweni, kodwa litsala nzima ngenxa yokuvalwa kwezinto.

translation.en: Things are not well right now. It's tough."
translation.xho: Izinto azihambi kakuhle ngoku. kunzima."

translation.en: Mapuranga's situation might look dire, but he says he's concerned about some of his unemployed peers who have fallen into alcohol, drugs and prostitution.
translation.xho: Imeko kaMapuranga ingajongeka inzima, kodwa uthi uxhalabile ngoongxa bakhe abangenamisebenzi abathe baziphosa etywaleni, kwiziyobisi nasekubeni bathengise ngemizimba.

translation.en: Many youths have lost hope," he said.
translation.xho: “Abantu abatsha abaninzi baphelelwe lithemba,” watsho.

translation.en: Across Africa, many others like Mapuranga are battling the economic downturn caused by COVID-19, losing jobs and seeing their education disrupted, a survey of people aged 18-24 in 15 countries.
translation.xho: Kwi-Afrika jikelele, abanye abaninzi abafana noMapuranga bajijisana nokuhla kwezinga loqoqosho okubangelwa yi-COVID-19, balahlekelwa yimisebenzi kwaye babona ukuphazamiseka kwezifundo zabo, uphando lwabantu abaneminyaka ephakathi kwe-18-24 kumazwe ali-15.

translation.en: The pandemic increased the already-high level of unemployment among the group, according to preliminary findings of the second annual Africa Youth Survey.
translation.xho: Isifo esihlasela ihlabathi sonyuse inqanaba elisele liphezulu lentswela-ngqesho phakathi kweqela, ngokweziphumo zokuqala zophando lwesibini lonyaka leAfrican Youth Survey.

translation.en: Nearly 20% of the 4,500 respondents said they became unemployed because of the pandemic and 37% were forced to stop or pause their education.
translation.xho: Phantse i-20% yabantu abaphendulileyo kubantu abangama-4,500 bathi baphelelwa ngumsebenzi ngenxa yesifo esihlasele ilizwe lonke kwaye i-37% banyanzeleka ukuba bayeke okanye bazimise izifundo zabo.

translation.en: Another 8% saw their pay docked, 18% had to move back home and 10% said they had to care for family members, according to the survey, which was commissioned by the Johannesburg-based Ichikowitz Family Foundation, whose founder, Ivor Ichikowitz, runs Paramount Group, an aerospace, security and military contractor.
translation.xho: Abanye ayi-8% bawubonile umvuzo wabo, i-18% kwafuneka ukuba babuyele emakhaya kwaye i-10% yathi kufuneka inyamekele amalungu osapho, ngokophando, olwagunyaziswa yi-Ichikowitz Family Foundation eseRhawutini, umseki wayo u-Ivor Ichikowitz. ophethe iParamount Group, inkampani esebenza nge-aerospace, ukhuseleko kunye nekontraka yomkhosi.

translation.en: Of the 1.3 billion people in Africa's 54 countries, an estimated 250 million are aged 18-24.
translation.xho: Kubantu abayi-1.3 sebhiliyoni abakumazwe angama-54 aseAfrika, kuqikelelwa ukuba ama-250 ezigidi baphakathi kweminyaka eli-18 ukuya ku-24 ubudala.

translation.en: The study was conducted in major urban and trading centers in Angola, Congo, The Republic of Congo, Ethopia, Gabon, Kenya, Malawi, Mozambique
translation.xho: Uphononongo lwenziwe kumaziko amakhulu eedolophu eAngola, eCongo, kwiRepublic of Congo, eEthopia, eGhabon, eGhana, eKenya, eMalawi, eMozambique

translation.en: Nigeria, Rwanda, South Africa, Sudan, Uganda and Zambia.
translation.xho: eNigeria, eRwanda, eMzantsi Afrika, eSudan, eUganda naseZambia.

translation.en: The researchers for PSB Insights, a global polling company, were nationals of each country where the survey took place and went door-to-door for in-depth, face-to-face interviews.
translation.xho: Abaphandi be-PSB Insights, inkampani yokuvota yehlabathi, apho abemi belizwe ngalinye kwiindawo apho uphando luqhutywe khona kwaye kungenwa kwindlu nganye kusenziwa udliwano-ndlebe olunzulu, ubuso ngobuso.

translation.en: People surveyed said the pandemic caused substantial disruptions to their schooling, emphasizing the need for more computers and internet access in Africa for online education.
translation.xho: Abantu abathathe inxaxheba yophando bathi esisifo sikazwelonke sibangela ukuphazamiseka okukhulu kwizifundo zabo, begxininisa kwimfuneko yeekhompyuter ezongezelelweyo kunye nokufikeleleka kwe-intanethi e-Afrika kwimfundo ye-Intanethi.

translation.en: Bola Badejo, 29, saw her salary at the broadcast station where she worked in Abuja, Nigeria, cut in half, and she complained that she could not make it on the equivalent of $146 a month.
translation.xho: UBola Badejo, oneminyaka engama-29 ubudala, wabona umvuzo wakhe kwisikhululo sosasazo apho wayesebenza khona e-Abuja, eNigeria, inqunyulwa phakathi, yaye wakhalaza ngelithi wayengenakukwazi ukuphila ngemali elingana ne-146 yeedola ngenyanga.

translation.en: I was already poor and I was working just for the sake of doing the job," she said. Then, in April 202, she was laid off.
translation.xho: “Ndandihleli ndisokola kwaye ndisebenzela nje ukwenza umsebenzi,” utshilo. Kwandula ke, ngoAprili 202, wagxothwa emsebenzini.

translation.en: I fell into depression because the whole thing was really sad. I felt I had nowhere to go," Badejo said.
translation.xho: Wakhathazeka emphefumlweni ngenxa yokuba yonke into yayibuhlungu ngokwenene. Ndaziva ndingenayo indawo yokuya, kusho uBadejo.

translation.en: After seven months without a job, she started a home cleaning business, and that has boosted her outlook, she said.
translation.xho: Emva kweenyanga ezisixhenxe engenawo umsebenzi, uye waqalisa ishishini lokucoca amakhaya, kwaye oko kuye kwaqaqambisa indlela abona ngayo izinto, utshilo.

translation.en: Badejo is typical of many who have found different ways to support themselves.
translation.xho: I-Badejo yinto eqhelekileyo kwabaninzi abaye bafumana iindlela ezahlukeneyo zokuzixhasa.

translation.en: In 2020, about 40% of those surveyed expressed optimism about the future.
translation.xho: Ngo-2020, malunga nama-40% yabo bathathe inxaxheba kuphando babonise ukuba nethemba ngengomso.

translation.en: The pandemic dented that confidence, lowering it to 31%, according to the survey.
translation.xho: Isifo kikazwelonke  sehlise kuzithemba, lehle lafika ku-31%, ngokutsho kophando.

translation.en: Uganda has had two lockdowns since April 2020, the second of which was relaxed in July. But businesses involving close human interaction — bars, gyms and nightclubs — remain closed by presidential order, leaving many young people without work.

translation.en: After I pay the rent, I am left with almost nothing," he said.
translation.xho: “Emva kokuba ndihlawule irenti, ndishiyeke ndingenanto,” utshilo.

translation.en: The half salary doesn't do anything."
translation.xho: Isiqingatha somvuzo asindenzeli nto.

translation.en: He makes a small profit on every sack of fruit he sells in Kampala.

translation.xho: Andilindelanga ukuba urhulumente andincede.

translation.en: Red Cross: 48,000 People Confirmed Missing Across Africa
translation.xho: IRed Cross: ngabantu abangama-48,000 akuqinisekiweyo ukuba balahlekile kwi-Afrika jikelele.

translation.en: The International Committee of the Red Cross says more than 48,000 people are missing across Africa, and at least 21,600 are minors.
translation.xho: I-International Committee ye-Red Cross ithi bangaphezu kwe-48,000 abantu abalahlekileyo kwi-Afrika iphela, kwaye ubuncinane abayi-21,600 ngabantwana.

translation.en: Most of the registered disappearances — widely believed to be a fraction of the continents wider, undocumented humanitarian tragedy — are linked to armed conflict, violence, disasters and migration across the continent.
translation.xho: Uninzi lwababhalisiweyo abanyamaleleyo - okukholelwa ngokubanzi ukuba liqhezu lelizwekazi elibanzi, intlekele yobuntu engabhalwanga - inxulunyaniswe nongquzulwano oluxhobileyo, ubundlobongela, iintlekele kunye nokufudukela kwilizwekazi liphela.

translation.en: The International Committee of the Red Cross says the number of people coming forward to report missing persons is on the rise in Africa.
translation.xho: I-International Committee yombutho weRed Cross ithi liyanda inani labantu abaza phambili bazokuxela abantu abalahlekileyo eAfrika jikelele.

translation.en: Amaya Fernandez, the humanitarian organizations adviser on the missing and their families for Western Africa, says the cause of the increasing numbers is two-fold.
translation.xho: U-Amaya Fernandez, ongumcebisi wemibutho yoluntu lwabalahlekileyo kunye neentsapho zabo eNtshona Afrika, uthi unobangela wokunyuka kwamanani kuphindwe kabini.

translation.en: On one hand, [it's] due to the fact we are trying to register more systematically cases of missing persons throughout the region.
translation.xho: “Kwesinye isandla, kungenxa yokuba sizama ukubhalisa amatyala abantu abalahlekileyo mmandla uphel.

translation.en: But also, certainly, [it's] due to the increased violence and conflict experienced on the continent, which increases at the same time the likelihood of people going missing.
translation.xho: Kodwa kwakhona, ngokuqinisekileyo, kungenxa yokuba kwande undlobongela kunye nongquzulwano olufunyenwe kwilizwekazi, kwangaxeshanye lunyusa amathuba okuba abantu balahleke umphelo.

translation.en: Looking at our figures, almost half of the missing persons have been recorded underage and most of them are men.
translation.xho: Xa kujongwa amanani ethu, phantse isiqingatha sabantu abalahlekileyo ngabantwana abancinci kwaye uninzi lwabo ngamadoda.

translation.en: Among the women ... we can see that the majority are minors," she said.
translation.xho: Phakathi kwabantu ababhinqileyo...siyabona ukuba uninzi ngabantwana, utshilo.

translation.en: The ICRC finding shows that 39,360 of the 48,000 missing people are from seven countries with armed conflicts.
translation.xho: Ukufunyanwa kwe-ICRC kubonisa ukuba abantu abayi 39,360 abalahlekileyo kubantu abayi-48,000 bavela kumazwe asixhenxe aneengxabano ezixhobileyo.

translation.en: According to the Stockholm International Peace and Research Institute, 20 countries in Africa have armed conflict.
translation.xho: Ngokutsho kweStockholm International Peace and Research Institute, amazwe angama-20 aseAfrika anongquzulwano ngezixhobo.

translation.en: Out of the 20, 10 are witnessing high-intensity armed conflicts.
translation.xho: Kumazwe angama-20, ali-10 abona ungquzulwano oluqatha.

translation.en: Fernandez says the ongoing conflict in some African countries has created more pain and suffering for families of missing persons.
translation.xho: UFernandez uthi ungquzulwano oluqhubekayo kumazwe athile eAfrika lubangele intlungu engakumbi kunye nokubandezeleka kwiintsapho zabo abalahlekileyo.

translation.en: Humanitarian consequences... caused by protracted armed conflicts are often... reflected in most of the interviews.
translation.xho: Iziphumo zobuntu... ezibangelwa lungquzulwano oluxhobileyo oluthatha ixesha elide luhlala lubonakala  kudliwano-ndlebe.

translation.en: For instance, half of the families interviewed in Nigeria reported that their relatives had gone missing in 2014-2015.
translation.xho: Umzekelo, isiqingatha seentsapho ezifumane udliwano-ndlebe eNigeria zaxela ukuba izalamane zabo zilahlekile ngo-2014-2015.

translation.en: [In] South Sudan, [the] majority of the families were looking for people that went missing between 2013 and 2016.
translation.xho: E-South Sudan, uninzi lwezizalwane bezikhangela abantu abalahlekileyo phakathi kweminyaka u-2013 no-2016.

translation.en: In Libya, families reported that they were looking for missing relatives from the late '70s until the present day, and the same goes for families in Ethiopia and Uganda," she said.
translation.xho: E-Libya, izizalwane zitshilo ukuba zikhangela izalamane zazo ezilahlekileyo ukusukela kwiminyaka yoo-70 ukuzokuthi ga ngoku, kwaye kuyafana ngokunjalo kwabo base-Ethiopia nase-Uganda,”utshilo.

translation.en: Some experts see the need to train community workers and security agencies on the importance of information sharing to help locate missing persons.
translation.xho: Ezinye iingcaphephe zibona kunyanzelekile ukuba kuqeqeshwe abasebenzi basekuhlaleni kunye nee-arhente zokhuseleko malunga nokubaluleka kokwabelana ngolwazi ukunceda ukufumana abantu abalahlekileyo.

translation.en: Zimbabwes assistant police commissioner Crispen Lifa says his country and the region need a data management system to follow up on the missing person cases.
translation.xho: Umncedisi womkomishinala wamapolisa eZimbabwe uCrispen Lifa uthi ilizwe lakhe kunye nommandla badinga inkqubo yolawulo lolwazi ukuze kulandelelwe amatyala abantu abadukileyo.

translation.en: There is a need to have a database which should be continuously updated so that all missing persons, and even those that are deceased... is captured in a database by police stations.
translation.xho: “Kukho isidingo sokuba kubekho uvimba weenkcukacha ekufuneka uhlaziywa ngalo lonke ixesha ukuze bonke abantu abalahlekileyo, kwanabo bangasekhoyo... bafakwe kwiziko ledatha kwizikhululo zamapolisa.

translation.en: At the end of the day, that information has to be put in place... [so] if you want to check across the country the number of missing persons, [you] would quickly get that information from a central point," he said.
translation.xho: Ekugqibeleni, olo lwazi kunyanzelekile ukuba lubekwe endaweni... ngoko ukuba ufuna ukujonga kwilizwe liphela inani labantu abalahlekileyo, uyakulufumana ngokukhawulezileyo ulwazi kwindawo ephakathi, utshilo.

translation.en: Fauziya Hussein's brother went missing in June after a Kenyan court released him.
translation.xho: Umninawa kaFauziya Hussein walahleka ngoJuni emva kokukhululwa yinkundla yaseKenya.

translation.en: The 39-year-old was accused of terrorism-related issues, but the court found him innocent and ordered the police to release him.
translation.xho: Le ndoda ineminyaka engama-39, utyholwa ngemiba edibene nobunqolobi, kodwa inkundla yamfumana engenatyala yaze yayalela ukuba akhululwe ngamapolisa.

translation.en: His sister, Fauziya Hussein, says they never saw him again.
translation.xho: Udadewabo, uFauziya Hussein, uthi abaphendanga bambona.

translation.en: I know they still have him. At every point [of his detention], my brother got a chance to make a phone call. He called my mother.
translation.xho: Ndiyayazi ukuba basambambile. Ngalo lonke ixesha awayevalelwe ngalo, umnakwethu wazinika ixesha lokufowuna. Wafowunela umama.

translation.en: So, if he was released, why didnt he call my mother?
translation.xho: Ngoko ukuba bamkhulula kutheni engamfowuneli umama?

translation.en: So, I know for a fact they did not release him," she said.
translation.xho: Ngoko, ndiyazi ukuba azange bamkhulule, utshilo.

translation.en: According to Hussein, police told her they released her brother.
translation.xho: NgokukaHussein, amapolisa amxelela ukuba amkhulule umnakwabo.

translation.en: The ICRC calls on African governments to prevent disappearances and help with search and identification, and addressing families needs.
translation.xho: I-ICRC icela oorhulumente baseAfrika ukuba bancede banqande ukunyamalala kwabantu ngokuthu kukhangelwe, kuchongwe,  kwaye kujongwe iimfuno zeentsapho ezilahlekelweyo.

translation.en: Olympics: Post-Bolt Era in 100m Begins in Tokyo
translation.xho: IiOlimpiki: Ixesha le-Post-Bolt kwi-100m Iqala eTokyo

translation.en: The post-Usain Bolt era in the men's Olympic 100 meters began on Saturday in Tokyo with Dorian Keletela, who is competing as part of the Olympic Refugee team, advancing to the next round with a personal best 10.33 seconds.
translation.xho: Ixesha le-post-Usain Bolt kwi-Olimpiki ye-100 yeemitha zamadoda liqale ngoMgqibelo eTokyo kunye noDorian Keletela, okhuphisanayo njengenxalenye yeqela le-Olympic Refugee, eqhubela phambili kumjikelo olandelayo nge-10.33 yemizuzwana.

translation.en: Bolt won three straight titles from Beijing in 2008 and his retirement in 2017 has left something of a vacuum in the showpiece athletics event, with no one stepping up to fill the Jamaican's shoes.
translation.xho: UBolt uphumelele izihloko ezithathu ezithe ngqo eBeijing ngo-2008 kwaye umhlala-phantsi wakhe ngo-2017 ushiye umngxuma kumsitho weembaleki, kungekho mntu unyukayo ukuzalisa izihlangu zaseJamaica.

translation.en: On Saturday, amid stifling temperatures that hovered above 30 degrees Celsius, sprinters took the track as they began their attempts to succeed world-record holder Bolt.
translation.xho: NgoMgqibelo, phakathi kwamaqondo obushushu angaphezulu ku-30, iimbaleki zangena ebaleni njengoko ziqala iinzame zokuphumelela uBolt ophethe irekhodi yehlabathi.

translation.en: Keletela, 22, is one of those athletes.
translation.xho: UKeletela, oneminyaka engama-22, ngomnye wabo badlali.

translation.en: Originally from the Democratic Republic of the Congo, he moved to Portugal in 2016 following the death of his parents due to conflict in his homeland and ran a personal best 10.33 to advance to the next round later on Saturday.
translation.xho: Ophuma kwilizwe iDemocratic Republic of the Congo, wafudukela ePortugal ngo-2016 emva kokusweleka kwabazali bakhe ngenxa yongquzulwano kwilizwe lakhe kwaye wabaleka eyona 10.33 engcono ukuya kumjikelo olandelayo kamva ngoMgqibelo.

translation.en: am very, very proud of this and I am very, very proud of this team.
translation.xho: Ndinebhongo kakhulu ngale nto kwaye ndiyazingca kakhulu ngeli qela.

translation.en: It gives me a lot of strength to go on," Keletela said after the race.
translation.xho: Kundinika amandla amakhulu okuqhubekeka,” utshilo uKeletela emva kogqatso.

translation.en: You can do ... anything, whether you are a refugee or not."
translation.xho: Unokwenza ... nantoni na, nokuba uyimbacu okanye awuyiyo.

translation.en: Others who progressed from the preliminary heats include Zimbabwe's Ngoni Makusha, who got off the block fast to win his heat in 10.32, and Oman's Barakat Al Harthi, who posted 10.27s to win his race.
translation.xho: Abanye abathe baqhubela phambili kwindima yokuqala baquka uNgoni Makusha waseZimbabwe, ophume ngokukhawuleza ukuze aphumelele ugqatso lwakhe ngo-10.32, kunye noBarakat Al Harthi waseOman, obeke i-10.27s ukuphumelela ugqatso lwakhe.

translation.en: There were three preliminary heats overall and the first three in each heat qualify to round one, along with the athlete who posts the next fastest time.
translation.xho: Kukho izigaba zogqatso ezohlulwe kathathu kwaye abokuqala abathathu kwisigaba ngasinye baphumelela kwisigaba sokuqala, kunye nembaleki ebeka ixesha elilandelayo ngokukhawuleza.

translation.en: The world's top sprinters enter the equation later Saturday, with the United States, who have won more golds in the event than all other nations combined, determined to take Bolt's mantle and regain their supremacy.
translation.xho: Iimbaleki ezigqwesileyo zehlabathi zingena kule nkquleqhu kamva ngoMgqibelo, kunye ne-United States, ephumelele igolide eninzi kulo mnyhadala ngaphezu kwazo zonke ezinye izizwe zidityanisiwe, zizimisele ukuthabatha ingubo kaBolt kwaye ziphinde zizuze ukongama kwazo.

translation.en: Their last gold medal win in the event came via Justin Gatlin in 2004.
translation.xho: Imbasa yabo yokugqibela yegolide kulo msitho yeza ngoJustin Gatlin ngo-2004.

translation.en: Contenders include Trayvon Bromell, whose 9.77 second run in Florida last month is the fastest of the year and propels him into the top tier of favorites in the race.
translation.xho: Abantu abakhuphisanayo baquka uTrayvon Bromell, obaleka imizuzwana eyi-9.77  eFlorida kwinyanga ephelileyo ngoyena ukhawulezayo kulonyaka kwaye oku umqhubele kwinqanaba eliphezulu leentandokazi kugqatso.

translation.en: His compatriot Ronnie Baker is probably his closest rival for podium positions and finished second to him at the U.S. trials with a time of 9.85.
translation.xho: Umlingane wakhe uRonnie Baker mhlawumbi ungoyena mntu usondeleyo kwizikhundla zeqonga kwaye wagqiba okwesibini kuye kwiimvavanyo zase-US ngemizuzwabz eyi-9.85.

translation.en: Canada's Andre De Grasse, who won bronze in the 100m in Rio five years ago, will be looking to go for the title this time around while South African sprinter Akani Simbine, fifth in Brazil and boasting the second-fastest time of the year, will also be in the running.
translation.xho: U-Andre De Grasse waseCanada, owaphumelela ubhedu kumgama we-100m eRio kwiminyaka emihlanu edlulileyo, uzakube ejonge ukulwela intshinga kweli tyeli lo gama imbaleki yoMzantsi Afrika, u-Akani Simbine, owaphumelela indawo yesihlanu eBrazil, ezingomba indawo yesibini kulo nyaka. naye uzakungenelela olugqatso.

translation.en: Bolt's former training partner, 2012 silver medalist Yohan Blake, the second-fastest man in history, will carry his nation's hopes on his shoulders.
translation.xho: Owayesakuba ngugxa kaBolt ekuqeqeshweni, owafumana imbasa yesilivere ngo-2012 u-Yohan Blake, indoda yesibini ngesantya embalini, uzakuthwala amathemba esizwe sakhe emagxeni akhe.

translation.en: South Africa's Zuma to Pursue Private Prosecution Against Prosecutor
translation.xho: UZuma woMzantsi Afrika uzakuqhuba uTshutshiso lwaBucala ngakuMtshutshisi

translation.en: Former South African President Jacob Zuma is pursuing private prosecution proceedings to remove the lead prosecutor in an arms deal corruption trial after failed legal challenges, his foundation said on Sunday.
translation.xho: Owayesakuba ngumongameli weli loMzantsi Afrika uJacob Zuma uqhuba iinkqubo zokutshutshisa ukususa umtshutshisi okhokelayo kwityala lobuqhophololo emva kokungaphumeleli kwezomthetho, isiseko sakhe satsho ngeCawe.

translation.en: Last month the Supreme Court of Appeal (SCA) torpedoed Zuma's latest bid to have lead prosecutor Billy Downer taken off the case after accusing him of bias and leaking of confidential information to a journalist in contravention of the national prosecution act, among other complaints.
translation.xho: Kwinyanga ephelileyo iNkundla ePhakamileyo yeziBheno (SCA) yasikhaba isicelo sikaZuma sokuba umtshutshisi okhokelayo uBilly Downer alishenxise eli tyala emva kokumtyhola ngokukheth’ icala kunye nokupapasha ulwazi oluyimfihlo kwintatheli ngokuchasene nomthetho wesizwe wotshutshiso, phakathi kwezinye izikhalazo.

translation.en: The SCA dismissed the application for leave to appeal on the grounds that there is no reasonable prospect of success and there is no other compelling reason why an appeal should be heard.
translation.xho: I-SCA isikhabile isicelo semvume yokubhena ngesizathu sokuba akukho themba libambekayo lokuphumelela kwaye asikho esinye isizathu esibambekayo sokuba kutheni isibheno kufuneka simanyelwe.

translation.en: The spokesman of the Jacob Zuma Foundation, Mzwanele Manyi told a press briefing that Zuma's instructions to his legal team to institute private prosecution "will now be put into operation in the next few days."
translation.xho: Isithethi seJacob Zuma Foundation, uMzwanele Manyi, uxelele indibano yonondaba ukuba imiyalelo kaZuma kwiqela lakhe lezomthetho ukuba liqalise ukutshutshisa labucala “iza kuqala ukusebenza kwezi ntsuku zimbalwa zizayo.

translation.en: He also said Zuma's legal team has filed a reconsideration application to the president of the SCA, a petition to hear the appeal.
translation.xho: Ukwathe igqiza lamagqwetha kaZuma lifake isicelo sokuphinda siqwalaselwe kumongameli weSCA, uxwebhu lwezikhalazo zokumamela isibheno.

translation.en: Zuma, who was ousted from the ruling African National Congress in 2018 after nearly two decades as president, has pleaded not guilty to charges of corruption, money laundering and racketeering in the long-running case over the $2 billion arms deal in the 1990s.
translation.xho: UZuma, owagxothwayo kumbutho olawulayo we-African National Congress ngo-2018 emva kweminyaka engamashumi amabini engumongameli, uzikhanyelanga izityholo zobuqhophololo, ukurhwaphiliza imali kunye norhwaphilizo kwityala ekudala ligquba malunga nesivumelwano sezixhobo ezixabisa iibhiliyoni ezimbini zeerandi kwiminyaka yoo-1990.

translation.en: The deal case has dogged Zuma since he was sacked as deputy president of the country in 2005. He said he was the victim of a political witch-hunt.
translation.xho: Ityala lesivumelwano limphethe kakubi uZuma ukusukela oko wagxothwa njengosekela mongameli welizwe ngo-2005. Wathi wayelixhoba lokuzingelwa kwamagqwirha kwezopolitiko.

translation.en: On Monday the long-delayed trail is set to get underway and Zuma will be present in court.
translation.xho: NgoMvulo lo ukuxoxwa kwetyala okusele kulibazisile kuzokuqala kwaye uZuma uzakube ekhona enkundleni.

translation.en: Manyi said Zuma, who turns 80 on Tuesday, is applying for a postponement because "it is very clear that the conditions for a fair trail are non-existent."
translation.xho: UManyi uthe uZuma, nogqiba iminyaka engamashumi asibhozo ubudala ngoLwesibini, ufaka isicelo sokumiswa ngenxa yokuba “kucace gca ukuba iimeko zokuxoxwa kwetyala ngokufanelekileyo azikho.

translation.en: On Monday his team will also respond to the supplementary affidavit served by the National Prosecution Authority where they seek to introduce new evidence in the trial.
translation.xho: NgoMvulo iqela lakhe liza kuphendula kwakhona kwingxelo efungelweyo eyongeziweyo enikwe nguGunyaziwe woTshutshiso weSizwe apho bafuna ukwazisa ubungqina obutsha kwityala.

translation.en: All His Excellency President Zuma really wants is his day in court, in a fair trial and certainly not in a forum which is being rigged by the State," Manyi said.
translation.xho: “Eyona nto ifunwa nguMongameli uZuma yimini yakhe enkundleni, kuxoxwe ngokungenamkhethe hayi kwiqonga eliqhathwa nguRhulumente,” utshilo uManyi.

translation.en: South Africa’s Neutral Stance on Russia Risks International Ties: Analysts
translation.xho: UBume boMzantsi Afrika bokungathathi cala kwiRussia bubeka umngcipheko wobudlelwane babazwe ngamazwe: abahlalutyi

translation.en: South African President Cyril Ramaphosa on Monday defended his neutral stance on Russia's invasion of Ukraine, calling for talks — not condemnation.
translation.xho: Umongameli woMzantsi Afrika uCyril Ramaphosa ngoMvulo ukhusele ukungathabathi cala kwakhe kuhlaselo lwase-Ukraine yiRussia, ememelela iingxoxo- hayi ukugxeka.

translation.en: Critics have blasted the government for failing to support Ukraine against its neighbor.
translation.xho: Abagxeki baye bagxeka urhulumente ngokusilela ukuxhasa iUkraine ngokuchasene nommelwane wayo.

translation.en: Analysts say South Africa is allowing historic political and economic ties with Moscow to risk relations with the rest of the world.
translation.xho: Abahlalutyi bathi uMzantsi Afrika uvumela ubudlelwane bezopolitiko nezoqoqosho neMoscow bubeke emngciphekweni ubudlelwane nehlabathi liphela.

translation.en: Negotiation rather than weapons or economic pressure is the mechanism Ramaphosa would like to see used to settle the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
translation.xho: Uthethathethwano endaweni yezixhobo okanye uxinzelelo lwezoqoqosho yindlela uRamaphosa angathanda ukuyibona isetyenziselwa ukulungisa impixano yaseRussia-neUkraine.

translation.en: Ramaphosas unwavering stance overruled an earlier call by the countrys international relations department for Russia to withdraw its forces.
translation.xho: Ukungaguquguquki kukaRamaphosa kwasikhaba isicelo sangaphambili sesebe lezobudlelwane bezizwe ngezizwe sokuba iRussia mayirhoxise imikhosi yayo.

translation.en: Leaza Jernberg is a Johannesburg-based independent researcher and consultant on diplomacy.
translation.xho: ULeaza Jernberg ngumphandi ozimeleyo oseRhawutini kunye nomcebisi kwidiplomacy.

translation.en: The Department of International Relations and Cooperation, [which] is largely the diplomat for South Africa, their initial instinct was to say, ‘Well, this was not acceptable.
translation.xho: “ISebe lezobudlelwane bamazwe ngamazwe nentsebenziswano, ngonozakuzaku boMzantsi Afrika ubukhulu becala, ithuku labo lakuqala yayikukuthi, ‘Kaloku, le ayamkelekanga.

translation.en: And that was kind of pulled back by the president who I think has this concern about allies and Russian and what this looks like," Jernberg said.
translation.xho: Kwaye loo nto yayihlehlisiwe ngumongameli endicinga ukuba unenkxalabo malunga namahlakani kunye neRussia kwaye ijongeka njani le nto, utshilo uJernberg.

translation.en: So even within South Africa, South Africa's position is very contested, even within government."
translation.xho: Ngoko nalapha eMzantsi Afrika, isikhundla soMzantsi Afrika sixabene kakhulu, nangaphakathi kurhulumente.

translation.en: South Africas ties to Russia stretch back to the 1960s when the Soviet Union gave support to anti-apartheid freedom fighters.
translation.xho: Amakhonkco oMzantsi Afrika kunye neRussia asuka ukusukela kwiminyaka yoo-1960 xa iSoviet Union yanika inkxaso kubalweli benkululeko ababechasene nocalucalulo.

translation.en: In subsequent years, politicians, including those from the ruling party, the African National Congress, maintained close ties with Russia.
translation.xho: Kwiminyaka eyalandelayo, abezopolitiko, kuquka abo bombutho olawulayo, iAfrican National Congress, bagcina ubuhlobo obusenyongweni neRassia.

translation.en: Which is why analysts said its no surprise that a foundation headed by former president Jacob Zuma has voiced support for Russias Vladimir Putin.
translation.xho: Kungoko abahlalutyi besithi ayothusi into yokuba isiseko esikhokelwa ngowayesakuba ngumongameli uJacob Zuma sivakalise inkxaso kuVladimir Putin waseRussia.

translation.en: Richard Calland is a public law professor at the University of Cape Town.
translation.xho: URichard Calland yinjingalwazi yezomthetho kwiYunivesithi yaseKapa.

translation.en: He [Putin] had a very close relationship with our former President, Jacob Zuma," Calland said.
translation.xho: “U[Putin] ebenobudlelwane obusondeleyo nowayesakuba nguMongameli wethu, uJacob Zuma,” utshilo uCallland.

translation.en: It was a corrupt relationship.
translation.xho: “Yayibubudlelwane borhwaphilizo.

translation.en: It fueled an illegal in the end, the court said, illegal procurement of Russian nuclear power, which was stopped by the courts.
translation.xho: Kwaphembelela into engekho mthethweni ekugqibeleni, inkundla yathi, ukuthengwa ngokungekho mthethweni kwamandla enyukliya aseRassia, okwayekiswa ziinkundla.

translation.en: And I fear that that interferes at least with some political attitudes in South Africa.
translation.xho: Kwaye ndinoloyiko lokuba oko kuphazamisana nezimo ezithile zezopolitiko eMzantsi Afrika.

translation.en: But I don't believe that it was the direct reason for the position that South Africa has taken."
translation.xho: Kodwa andikholelwa ukuba yayisisizathu esithe ngqo kwisikhundla esithathwe nguMzantsi Afrika.

translation.en: Instead, Calland says, South African officials are simply following the countrys standard position on foreign conflicts.
translation.xho: Endaweni yoko, uCallland uthi, amagosa oMzantsi Afrika alandela nje umgangatho welizwe kwimilo yamazwe angaphandle.

translation.en: I'm well acquainted with and in close contact with South Africa's kind of senior diplomatic officials, and they are very steeped in this tradition of non-alignment," Calland said.
translation.xho: “Ndibazi kakuhle kwaye ndinxibelelana kakhulu namagosa aphezulu ozakuzo eMzantsi Afrika, kwaye bangene nzulu kwelisiko lokungakhethi cala,” utshilo uCallland.

translation.en: Political dialogue is their middle name, so to speak.
translation.xho: Ingxoxo yezopolitiko ligama labo eliphakathi, xa sesithetha.

translation.en: And I think that on this one, they wanted to maintain this kind of nonpartisan position in order to promote that dialogue."
translation.xho: Kwaye ndicinga ukuba kule, bebefuna ukugcina olu hlobo lwesikhundla esingakhethi cala ukuze bakhuthaze loo ngxoxo.

translation.en: Another factor at play is the countrys position within the economic bloc, BRICS, which includes Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa.
translation.xho: Enye into edlala indima kukuma kwelizwe kumanyano lwezoqoqosho, iBRICS, equka iBrazil, Russia, India, China kunye noMzantsi Afrika.

translation.en: Analysts said South Africa may be attempting to maintain trade relations with Russia and China.
translation.xho: Abahlalutyi bathi uMzantsi Afrika usenokuba uzama ukugcina ubudlelwane borhwebo neRussia neChina.

translation.en: But international relations expert Jernberg said that stance is ultimately counterproductive.
translation.xho: Kodwa ingcaphephe kubudlelwane bamazwe aphesheya uJernberg uthe ukuma akunamveliso.

translation.en: In that case, we're actually backing the wrong horse," Jernberg said.
translation.xho: Xa kunjalo, sixhasa ihashe elingelilo,” utshilo uJernberg.

translation.en: When you look at the EU, the European Union as a block, South Africas combined trade to the European Union is actually far larger. And so then if you're going to make an economic argument, you should surely be arguing that between the United States and between, and Europe, is actually a greater economic interest."
translation.xho: Xa ujonga i-EU, iEuropien Union njengebhloko, urhwebo oludityanisiweyo loMzantsi Afrika kwiManyano yaseYurophu ngokwenene lukhulu kakhulu. I-United States naphakathi, kunye neYurophu, ngokwenene inomdla omkhulu wezoqoqosho.

translation.en: Whatever the motives, it has left Western nations siding with Ukraine disappointed, and experts warn there could be implications for South Africa in the future.
translation.xho: Nokuba zithini na iinjongo, oko kushiye amazwe aseNtshona abambisene  neiUkraine edanile, kwaye iingcaphephe zilumkisa ngelithi kusenokubakho ifuthe kuMzantsi Afrika kwixesha elizayo.

translation.en: Ina Gouws is a political science lecturer at South Africas University of the Free State.
translation.xho: U-Ina Gouws ngumhlohli wenzululwazi yezopolitiko kwiYunivesithi yoMzantsi Afrika yaseFreyistata.

translation.en: These kinds of things down the road, become problematic," Gouws said.
translation.xho: “Ezi ntlobo zezinto ekuhambeni kwexesha, ziba yingxaki,” utshilo uGouws.

translation.en: If you don't display that kind of cooperation and sound thinking, and firm condemnation when a country does something like this, down the road, it bites you when you need support from the international community."
translation.xho: Ukuba awubonisi olo hlobo lwentsebenziswano kunye nokucinga okuvakalayo, kunye nokugwetywa okuqinileyo xa ilizwe lenza into enje, ekuhambeni kwexesha, iyakuluma xa udinga inkxaso evela kuluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe.

translation.en: While the ramifications for South Africa remain uncertain, experts agree its unlikely the country will change its position any time soon.
translation.xho: Ngelixa iziphumo zoMzantsi Afrika zisahleli zingaqinisekanga, iingcali ziyavuma ukuba akunakufane kwenzeke ukuba elilizwe litshintshe imeko yalo okwangoku.

translation.en: Divided America: America's Beauty Hasn't Faded. Has its Greatness?
translation.xho: IMelika eyahlulahluliweyo:Ubuhle beMelika abuphelanga. Ukubalasela kwayo kona?

translation.en: Americans agree on this much: They are disgusted with politics.
translation.xho: Abemi basemelika bavumelana ngoku:Bakruqukile zezopolitiko.

translation.en: They look toward Washington and see a broken federal government.
translation.xho: Bathi bokujonga eWashington, babone urhulumente weFederal owophukileyo.

translation.en: A place where politicians seem more interested in self-preservation than We the People.
translation.xho: Indawo apho abezopolitiko babonakala umdla wabo ujolise eziqwini zabo kunokuba ujolise eluntwini.

translation.en: Things don't seem much better in state capitals, and, who knows?
translation.xho: Izinto azibonakali zingcono kwikomkhulu likarhulumente, kwaye, kwazi bani?

translation.en: Lead-tainted water may be pouring out of their kitchen faucet next.
translation.xho: Isenokwenzeka ukuba lamanzi amdaka azakuphuma kwimpompo zamakhitshi abo.

translation.en: Yet Americans say they still believe in America, the experiment in democracy that the founders described as a place where the government should protect the rights of ordinary people to life, liberty and the persuit of hapiness.
translation.xho: Kodwa abemi baseMelika bathi basakholelwa kwiMelika, indlela abaseki belizwe abalicacisa ngalo ilinge ledemokhrasi njengendawo apho urhulumente kunyazeleke ukuba akhusele amalungelo oluntu, inkululeko kwakunye nokufuna ulonwabo.

translation.en: There's something at the core of America they long for, even if it's hard to define and seems distant in 2016.
translation.xho: Ikhona into kumbindi weMelika abayilangazelelayo, nokuba kunzima ukuyicacisa kwaye ibonakala ikude ngo-2016.

translation.en: Donald Trump proclaims he will "make America great again.
translation.xho: uDonald Trump ubhengeza ukuba "uzakuyenza ibalasele kwakhona iMelika".

translation.en: ' Hillary Clinton counters that America "has never stopped being great.''
translation.xho: uHillary Clinton uphikisa uthi iMelika "ayizange iyeke ukugqwesa".

translation.en: But what does that even mean?
translation.xho: kodwa oku kuthetha ukuthini?

translation.en: And who gets to define greatness?
translation.xho: Kwaye ngubani unothi yena achaze ukubalasela?

translation.en: A billionaire businessman, a former secretary of state - or an aging musician in New Orleans?
translation.xho: Ngusomashishini onamawaka ezigidi, ngowayesakuba ngunobhala welizwe, okanye yimvumi eyalupheleyo eNew Orleans?

translation.en: What about the woman in Illinois who served in the U.S. military in Afghanistan?
translation.xho: Uthini ngomfazi eIllinois owayesebenza emkhosini weU.S eAffghanistan?

translation.en: Or the industrial worker worried about his job in Alabama?
translation.xho: Okanye umsebenzi woshishino okhathazekileyo ngomsebenzi wakhe eAlabama?

translation.en: The Associated Press interviewed a wide range of Americans to get a sense of what they think about the nation's greatness in the twilight of President Barrack Obama's eight years in office.
translation.xho: IAssociation Press ibenodliwanondlebe nabemi abahlukileyo baseMelika

translation.en: The responses were as different as Americans themselves, yet a theme emerged: Compared to other nations, the United States is at least good, probably even great.
translation.xho: Iimpendulo zazohlukile njengabemi beMelika, kodwa kwavela into enye phambili: Xa ithelekiswa nezinye izizwe, iUnited Statea noko ilungile, mhlawumbi ibalasele

translation.en: But there's a lot of work to be done.
translation.xho: Kodwa umninzi umsebenzi ekufuneka wenziwe.

translation.en: Yes, America is great.
translation.xho: Ewe, IMelika ibalasele.

translation.en: It could be a lot better if the politicians weren't fighting each other all the time ...,'' said Rodney Kimball, a 74-year-old stove dealer in West Bethel, Maine.
translation.xho: Bekungaba ngcono kakhulu ukuba abezopolitiko bebengwalisani amaxesha amaninzi..."utshilo uRodney Kimbali, umthengisi wezitovu oneminyaka engama-74 waseWest Bethel, eMeine.

translation.en: America is divided by political party, choice of media, income, gender, race or ethnic group, religious faith (or not), generation, geography and general outlook on the country's future.
translation.xho: IMelika yahlulwe ngezopolitiko, ukhetho lwamajelo eendaba, imivuzo, isini, ibala okanye ubuhlanga, inkolo (ukungakholwa) izizukulwana, ummandla kunye neembono jikelele ngekamva lelizwe.

translation.en: Pundits have proclaimed the electorate angry and wondered if the nation can ever recover the sense of unity experienced in the immediate aftermath of the al-Qaida attacks that took place 15 years ago this September.
translation.xho: Iingcali zivakalise ukuba abavoti banomsindo kwaye banemibuzo yokuba isizwe siyakubuye siphinde simanyane emva kweziphumo ezikhawulezileyo zohlaselo lwe al-Qaida ezakugqiba malunga neminyaka eli-15 yenzekayo kuloSeptemba.

translation.en: The current dearth of confidence in the nation's politics and government is striking.
translation.xho: Oku kufa kokuzithemba kwezopolitiko norhulumento lwesisizwe luyamangalisa.

translation.en: I think that America as an idea is one of the most beautiful ideas that the world has ever known.
translation.xho: Ndicinga ukuba iMelika njengembono yenye yeembono ezintle eyakhe yabonwa lihlabathi.

translation.en: I think that American opportunity and ingenuity has built some of the most incredible technologies and innovations today,'' said Allene Swanson, 22, of Chicago.
translation.xho: Ndicinga ukuba ithuba laseMelika kunye nobuchule bakhe ezona zinto zakhe zaphezulu zetekhnology kunye nezinto ezintsa namhlanje." utshilo uAllene Swanson, oneminyaka engama-22 waseChicago.

translation.en: For some, real success has always seemed out of reach.
translation.xho: Kwabanye, impumelelo yokwenyani ibisoloko ibonakala njengento engafikilelekiyo.

translation.en: The old textile mill across town is a reminder, dark and empty because labor was cheaper in Southeast Asia or Latin America; the manufacturing plant on the outskirts of the city uses steel imported from China.
translation.xho: Indawo yokusila endala engapha kwedolophu isisikhumbuzo, imnyama kwaye ayinanto ngenxa yokuba ukuqesha abasebenzi kusexabisweni elisezantsi eSoutheast Asia okanye eLatin Amerika; umzi mveliso ongaphandle kwaledolophu usebenzisa iintsimbi ezivela eChina.

translation.en: Employment has rebounded since the great recession, but wages are stagnant.
translation.xho: Amathuba engqesho aye abangcono ukusukela ngethuba lokudodobala okukhulu koqoqosho, kodwa imivuzo yona isame ndawonye.

translation.en: Forget saving for a home - millions work more than one job just to keep food on the table and the lights on.
translation.xho: Libala ngokugcinela ikhaya - izigidi zisebenza kwindawo ezingaphezu kwenye ukuze zihlale zinokutya etafileni kwaye izibane zingacimanga.

translation.en: What happened to the American dream? That's what is being asked in places like inner city St. Louis, home to 32-year-old Craig House.
translation.xho: Kwenzeka ntoni kwiphuma leMelika? Le yinto ehlala ibuzwa kwiindawo ezifana needolophu zakho St.Louis, ikhaya loneminyaka engama-32 uCraig House.

translation.en: He's lives with his grandmother in a sea of burned-out buildings and abandoned schools not far from a hip, trendy part of town.
translation.xho: Uhlala nomakhulu wakhe kulwandle lwezakhiwo ezitshileyo kunye nezikolo ezishiyiweyo kude kufuphi nedolophu ethandwayo.

translation.en: America has always been great, just not for me and my people. For us it's been the worst ever,'' said House, shaking his head as he takes a long drag off his cigarette.
translation.xho: Imelika kudala yabalilizwe eliphuhlileyo, kodwa akunjalo kum nakubantu bam. Kuthi oko yabalilizwe elibi kunawo onke," ethetha uHouse, enikina entlkoko etshaya icuba lakhe.

translation.en: People come from all over the world, Arabs own this, that. Black man don't own nothing.''
translation.xho: Abantu basuka kwindawo ngendawo kwihlabathi lonke, Ama-Arab anezinto ngezinto. Abantu abamnyama abananto."

translation.en: Known as "Deacon'' in his native New Orleans, 74-year-old guitarist John Moore remembers a time when America was headed in the right direction, when everything seemed to be coming together.
translation.xho: Owaziwa njengo "Deacon" kwilizwe lakowabo eNew Orleans, umdlali wesiginci oneminyaka engama-74 uJohn Moore ukhumbula ixesha apho iMelika yayisingise kwindlela efanelekileyo, apho yonke into yayibukeka isiza kakuhle.

translation.en: It was in the 1960s, when black people like Moore were seeing an end to racial segregation; when women were gaining equality;
translation.xho: Kwakungeminyaka yee-1960s, ngethuba abantu abamnyama abafana noMoore babebona ukuphela kocalucalulo ngokobuhlanga; apho abantu basethyini babefumana ukulingana;

translation.en: When politicians were taking a stand to end poverty despite the turmoil of protests over the Vietnam War.
translation.xho: Apho abezopolotika babethabatha amanyathelo okuphelisa intlupheko nangona kukho isiphithiphithi sabaqhankqalazela imfazwe yaseVietnam.

translation.en: Those were the best years,'' said Moore, tears welling in his eyes in the living room-turned-recording studio of his shotgun house.
translation.xho: Leyo yayiyiminyaka engcono," utshilo uMoore, esihla ionyambezi kwigumbi lokuhlala elijikwe lenziwa indawo apho enzela kuyo umcolo endlini yakhe.

translation.en: And then they were destroyed right before my very eyes when they assassinated all of our Leaders.
translation.xho: Kwaye ke yatshatyalaliswa phambi kwamehlo am nguthuba kubulawa zonke iinkokheli zethu.

translation.en: Robert Kennedy, John Kennedy, Martin Luther King, Malcom X. All of our leaders.
translation.xho: uRobert Kennedy, uJohn Kennedy, uMartin Luther King, uMalcom X. Zonke iinkokheli zethu.

translation.en: And you know that was the end of all hope, we had no more hope.
translation.xho: Kwaye uyazi ukuba oko yabasisiphelo salolonke ithemba, sasingasenalo ithemba.

translation.en: Hope returned, at least for some, in 2008 when a mixed-race lawyer with a foreign-sounding name won the White House.
translation.xho: Ithemba labuya, kwabanye, ngonyaka ka-2008 ngethuba igqwetha eluhlanga oluxubeneyo enegama elinesandi sangaphandle iphumelela iWhite House.
